short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detect and auto close Facebook sponsored ads post

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adblock for Facebook: 🚫✨ Your Ad-Free Facebook Experience Starts Here! 🌟

Features:
1. Comprehensive Ad(Sponsored Post) Detection: Our extension identifies and minimizes a variety of ads in your Facebook Main Feed, Search Feed, and Video Feed. 🚀

2. Multilingual Ad Detection: No matter what language your Facebook is set to, our extension will detect ads across multiple languages. 🌐

3.User-Controlled Ad Management: Easily close ads by clicking the "Close" button, or restore them to their original size with the "Expand" button. 🖱️🔍

4. Auto Close Ads: Enable the "Auto Close Ads" feature to automatically close ads—this feature requires a subscription. Once subscribed, refresh your Facebook page to see ads automatically closed with a counter in the top right corner. Note: The counter resets with each page refresh. 🔄📉

5. Community Support: If you encounter an ad that isn't detected, simply copy the link and share it with us in our Telegram Group. We’ll investigate and keep the extension updated. 👥🔗

Try it now for free! Ensure it effectively marks ads, and subscribe to unlock the full automatic ad-blocking capabilities. Even without a subscription, you can still manually close ads with just a click! 🚀👍

Install today and enjoy a cleaner, ad-free Facebook experience!
